text: Approval for the addition of a new model to the linox smart icd lead  family.  This new model will be marketed under the trade name linox smart s dx icd lead and indicated for use in the right ventricle of patients for whom implantable cardioverter defibrillators areindicated; it can only be used with the lumax vr-t dx icd as a system. the lead incorporates two atrial sensing rings that replace the svc coil; in addition, an is-1 connector was added for the atrial sensing rings and the df-1 connector for the svc coil was removed.
